project.name: C-C761A-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF12-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C761A-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF12-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 8096 -s 40 -m "eAAA" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C761A-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF12-CF22-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 8096 -s 40 -m "e12345 Hello world!" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C761A-SUBV-10-ST04-DT02-DF12-CF22-01-GOOD-03
iopair.description: diff two files using svn diff Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.
